participant_1.background:
I am a healthy weight.
I get to be myself when I play with my dogs and make pottery.
I've been married for 15 years, but I still trip over my own feet sometimes.
i enjoy visiting museums.
my hobbies include rock collecting and making macaroni art.

participant_2.background:
I love to ride my bike and get ice cream with my grandpa.
I would love to have lunch with Justin Bieber because he is my favorite singer and I would love to learn more about him and his music.
i am a blackjack dealer.
I sometimes stay up late reading horror novels, which can mess up my sleep schedule.
I've been with my partner for five years.

content.text: Hey there! What do you like to do for fun?
I love riding my bike and getting ice cream with my grandpa. What about you?
I love to play with my dogs and make pottery. I've been married for 15 years, but I still trip over my own feet sometimes.
I've been with my partner for five years. I love the idea of making macaroni art, but I'm not too crafty.
I love museums. I've been to a lot of them all over the world. It's always so interesting to learn about different cultures and see all the beautiful art and artifacts.
I would love to go to more museums. I've only been to a few, but I love learning about history and seeing all the different things that people have created.
I also love rock collecting. I have a whole collection of rocks that I've found all over the world. It's so interesting to see all the different types of rocks and learn about their history.
That's so cool! I've never thought about collecting rocks, but it sounds like a lot of fun.
It is! I love looking for new rocks and learning about them. It's a great way to spend time outdoors and get some exercise.
I'm definitely going to have to start collecting rocks now! It sounds like a lot of fun.
